meta.name: LMS Dashboard Design System
meta.goal: A comprehensive, code-aligned design guide for AI to follow when building new features in this app. This file intentionally documents the exact Tailwind class recipes used across the UI components and cards.

notes: Prefer using existing UI primitives in `src/components/ui/*` over creating one-off Tailwind class strings.
If you must introduce a new visual token (color, radius, shadow), add it to Tailwind config first, then reference it in components.

layoutPhilosophy: A bright lime page background with floating white cards as the primary content surfaces.
Large radii and soft shadows create depth; borders are extremely subtle (black at 6â€“10% opacity).
Typography is neutral and clean; emphasis is via size/weight (not color).
Interactive affordances are quiet but clear: hover background on rows, hover shadow on controls, and a consistent purple focus ring.

notes: All interactive controls must have visible focus states (buttons, icon buttons, toggles, calendar day buttons, links).
Do not remove outlines without replacing them with the ring.

usageGuidelines: Default content lives on `bg-white` cards; avoid tinted card backgrounds except for subtle row hover/highlight (`bg-ink-50`).
Use purple as the single accent for progress indicators, toggles, and selection states.
Use lime for the overall page background and primary button fills (as currently implemented).
Avoid introducing new saturated colors for text; use ink neutrals and reserve color for status/accents.

page.columnPattern: Each column is a vertical stack: `space-y-6`.

always: Use the UI primitives from `src/components/ui/*` whenever possible (Card, Button, IconButton, Badge, Chip, Toggle, Avatar, AvatarStack, ProgressRing).
Follow the existing dashboard spacing: cards are separated by `gap-6` / `space-y-6`, and cards use `p-6`.
Use neutral ink colors for text (`text-ink-900` and `text-ink-500`).
Use `accent-purple-500` for progress/selection/toggles, and `brand-lime-600` for primary button fills and selected calendar day.
Every interactive element must have the purple focus ring.
avoid: Avoid custom CSS unless absolutely necessary; prefer Tailwind and the existing primitives.
Avoid heavy dividers. Prefer whitespace; when needed, use `border-t border-black/[0.06]`.
Avoid introducing new design tokens ad-hoc (e.g., random hex colors or custom shadows).
Avoid inconsistent radii (stick to rounded-xl for cards, rounded-md for rows/controls, rounded-pill for pills, rounded-full for avatars).
whenAddingNewComponents: Create a primitive in `src/components/ui/` only if it will be reused in multiple cards/features.
Expose variants and sizes in the component API (like Button does) instead of duplicating class strings.
Document the new component in this JSON under `components.ui` with its Tailwind recipe.

Card.description: Primary surface container (white card with large radius, subtle border, and soft shadow).

tailwind.root: bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-card hover:shadow-card-hover transition-shadow duration-180 border border-black/[0.06]

usageNotes: Use as the top-level container for every dashboard module/card.
Do not remove the subtle border; it helps on the bright lime background.

tailwind.base: font-medium transition-all duration-180 border focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-purple-400 focus:ring-offset-2

behavior.hover: Hover adds shadow on primary/secondary/danger via `hover:shadow-control`.
behavior.disabled: Not styled explicitly; if added, use `disabled:opacity-45 disabled:pointer-events-none` for consistency.

IconButton.description: Square icon-only control used for overflow menus and calendar nav.

tailwind.root: w-10 h-10 rounded-md bg-white border border-black/[0.08] flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-ink-50 transition-colors duration-180 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-purple-400 focus:ring-offset-2
inline-flex items-center justify-center min-w-5 h-5 px-1.5 rounded-pill bg-brand-lime-600 text-xs font-medium text-ink-900
inline-flex items-center h-8 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-pill text-xs border transition-colors duration-180

Toggle.description: iOS-style toggle switch, used in Integrations list.

tailwind.rootBase: relative inline-flex h-6.5 w-11 items-center rounded-pill transition-colors duration-180 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-purple-400 focus:ring-offset-2
tailwind.thumbBase: inline-block h-5.5 w-5.5 transform rounded-full bg-white transition-transform duration-180

interaction.trigger: button (click toggles enabled state via onChange(!enabled))

AvatarStack.description: Overlapping avatars with optional overflow count.

tailwind.overflowPill: w-7 h-7 rounded-full bg-ink-100 border-2 border-white flex items-center justify-center

ProgressRing.description: Circular progress KPI; purple stroke over a subtle neutral track.

tailwindHighlights.name: text-2xl font-semibold text-ink-900 leading-tight tracking-tight mb-1.5

tailwindHighlights.row: flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-md transition-colors hover:bg-ink-50

tailwindHighlights.weekday: text-center text-[11px] font-medium text-ink-500 uppercase tracking-wide h-6 flex items-center justify-center
tailwindHighlights.dayBase: h-9 w-9 rounded-xl text-xs font-normal transition-all duration-180 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-purple-400

tailwindHighlights.row: flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-md hover:bg-ink-50 transition-colors
tailwindHighlights.iconBox: w-7 h-7 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0
tailwindHighlights.name: text-sm font-medium text-ink-900 leading-relaxed

IntegrationsCard.note: Row icon background colors are currently ad-hoc (`bg-purple-500`, `bg-blue-500`, `bg-gray-900`) and not part of the core brand palette. Prefer aligning future integrations to brand/accent tokens unless product requirements dictate otherwise.

tailwindHighlights.methodPill: h-8 px-3 rounded-xl bg-white border border-black/[0.08] flex items-center justify-center

row.description: Default interactive row pattern used in cards (notifications, integrations).
row.tailwindRecipe: flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-md hover:bg-ink-50 transition-colors

darkMode.note: This UI is optimized for bright lime backgrounds with white cards. If dark mode is added, revisit all semantic tokens, borders, and contrast.

checklistForNewUI: Does the feature live inside a `Card` with `p-6` and `rounded-xl`?
Are gaps consistent with the dashboard (`gap-6`, `space-y-6`, `mb-4`, `space-y-3`)?
Are text colors limited to ink neutrals (`text-ink-900`, `text-ink-500`, `text-ink-700`, `text-ink-300`)?
Do all interactive elements have the purple focus ring?
Is purple only used for accents (progress/toggles/selection), not for body copy?
